episodes.title: The Sickening Crimes of a Teenage Vampire Cult | Handsome Devils | True Crime Documentary
episodes.description:
Rod Ferrell is the teenage leader of a violent vampire cult. When his friend Heather reveals she hates her parents, Rod devises a murderous plan to prove his power –by doing the unthinkable.

Show: Handsome Devils

episodes.title: Jonestown: Paradise Lost | Crime Documentary | The Horror of a Cult | True Crime Central
episodes.description:
This dramatic documentary drama tracks the final build up to a horrific doomsday: the infamous mass murder and suicides of Jim Jones' cult followers in the jungles of Guyana, where over 900 men, women, and children died on November 18, 1978.
